attributes.action: expell from Government, any person mad enough to think people of limited means could find it economical to posess a working car and leave it idle while using public transport.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: A person who has had to save for years to be able to buy a car, can not afford to pay for alternative local transport while leaving their car idle at home. If there was no maintenance costs, road tax, insurance cost going to waste, one might be able on occasions to afford the luxury of dual provision. Only a mad person, or someone with more money than most,or a Government Minister, would think it possible.
